sentence: Esprit greeted us and took excellent care of us from our room to resturant selections
Great wine bar
Also a very nice bar on the ground floor
The hotel is in a great location on 46th Street near Times Square close to theaters restaurants and key NYC sights
Just a block away from many theaters and excellent restaurants

The staff was readily available to offer suggestions about restaurants to place an order for early morning pick up for transportation to the airport and to recommend things to see in the area for those who came unprepared
Good restaurant and comfortable rooms
The Breakfast sandwich was delicious plentiful
She gave excellent dinner recommendations very friendly and always helpful
The hotel sent up a bottle of champagne and the best cupcakes in the world
therefor bar is closed and service is in the lobby in the cold in the middle of checkin checkout and luguages
I was advised that this property ’s restaurant does not participate in the Complementary Chefs Taste IC benefit
Their restaurant and bar are closed

Based on the hotel reviews we were looking forward to staying here unfortunately from that point onwards the service received at this hotel is the worst I have received in all hotels I have ever stayed at plus the breakfast prices are extortionate for the available food options

You are told that 10 will be deducted from your mini bar or bar bill as part of this but as a bottle of water costs 10 there is not really much you can get from the mini bar without spending more money
As platinum our only perk was a 10 room credit from the mini bar in our room
Front desk did not handle removing a FAKE CHARGE from the restaurant on 1025 when only one person had eaten at the restaurant for breakfast
Breakfast was fresh and varied offering scrambled eggs or any way you want them to order
Prices at bar extortionate
Everything was a bit pricey from the 10 dollar bottles of water in the room to the overpriced breakfast that was fairly basic
